# passThumbnailImage

**Instance Property**

A CGImage object representing the card artwork of the pass you use during provisioning.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var passThumbnailImage: CGImage? { get }
```

## Creating a preview of the pass

- **init(passThumbnail:localizedDescription:)**: Provides a preview of an image object that represents the pass you add to Wallet.
- **localizedDescription**: A localized description of the pass.
